title: How to Make Cinnamon Apple Rings

steps.headline: Wash the apples and core them.
Cut the apples into crosswise rings.
Combine candies, sugar and water in a 10-inch (25cm) skillet.
Cook and stir sugar mixture over medium heat.
Stir the apple rings occasionally during cooking.
Cool the apples rings in the candy mixture.
Finished.
steps.description: They're now ready to be served immediately. Serve with cream, ice cream or a sprinkling of cinnamon sugar.

text: Preparing the Apples Wash the apples and core them.  Peel the apples, if desired.  Cut the apples into crosswise rings.  Cooking the Apple Rings Combine candies, sugar and water in a 10-inch (25cm) skillet.  Cook and stir sugar mixture over medium heat.  Add the apple rings. Simmer gently for 15 to 20 minutes. Stir the apple rings occasionally during cooking.  Cool the apples rings in the candy mixture.  Drain.  Finished. They're now ready to be served immediately. Serve with cream, ice cream or a sprinkling of cinnamon sugar.
